source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_00<tab>Naldiq & Vymelli's shipwright Hezzkhezl needs help heating his rivets.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_00<tab>ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社の造船師ヘッツケスルは、リベット打ち作業に必要な熱源を必要としているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_01<tab>Journey outside of the Moraby Drydocks and slay three lightning sprites for their cores.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_01<tab>ライトニングスプライトを討伐し、「ライトニングスプライトの核」を3個集めよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_02<tab>You have collected three intact cores. Now deliver them to Hezzkhezl.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_02<tab>「ライトニングスプライトの核」が集まった。モラビー造船廠にいる造船師「ヘッツケスル」に届けよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_03<tab>Hezzkhezl is delighted at your return, and tells you that it was <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var> foreman Ahtbyrm who originally conceived the idea of using sprite cores to heat rivets.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_SEQ_03<tab>「ライトニングスプライトの核」を利用した工法は、筆頭造船師アートビルムが考案したものだという。その腕前と人柄から、筆頭造船師は、部下から慕われているようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_00<tab>Slay lightning sprites and obtain their cores.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_00<tab>ライトニングスプライトを討伐し、核を入手

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the elemental cores to Hezzkhezl.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_TODO_01<tab>ヘッツケスルにライトニングスプライトの核を届ける

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_1<tab>When it comes to rivetin', ye could search the realm over, but ye won't find none better than Hezzkhezl. Ten score rivets a bell, I drive. Twice that if I'm not in me cups!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_1俺は、リベット打ちの達人よ。
水漏れせんように、鉄板をガッチリと接合するにゃ、
真っ赤に焼けたリベットを打ち込まにゃならん！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_2<tab>The key to drivin' rivets proper-like is how hot ye can get the buggers. The hotter the rivet, the stronger the bond she'll make with the steel plate. Problem bein', was I to heat me rivets in the forge, they'd be cold as a dead whore's crotch by the time I hauled 'em back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_2コツは、「ライトニングスプライトの核」を使うことさ。
こいつでリベットを加熱すりゃ、効果テキメン。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_3<tab>'Tis why I use the white-hot cores o' lightnin' sprites...but as ye can see, me supply's runnin' a tad low. If it ain't too much trouble, would ye be so kind as to fetch me some? Ye look as if ye could take on a whole pack o' sprites with one hand tied behind yer arse.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_3だが、こいつの在庫が、ちょいと心許なくてね。
「ライトニングスプライト」を倒して、
その核を3個ほど集めてきてくれよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_10<tab>Three cores, and I can be done with the day's work and back at the alehouse, where I belong.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_10「ライトニングスプライトの核」を3個だぜ。
リベットの加熱には、そいつがいちばん具合がいいからな。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_11<tab>Leviathan's eye! Ye really done gone an' fetched me the blinkin' cores! Ahtbyrm'll be right pleased to see that, he will.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_11おお、やってくれたか、ありがてえ！
ライトニングスプライトの核を使う、この工法は
筆頭造船師のアートビルムさんが考えたんだぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_12<tab>'Twas the foreman what came up with the idea to use cores to heat the rivets. A clever one, that man. Sharper than a fang in a fishback's beak. Probably is why he made chief so quick, like.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA113_00410_HEZZKHEZL_000_12あの方は、本当に大した器だよ。
造船師を志したのは、遅い方だってのに、
あっという間に筆頭造船師に上りつめたからな。
